game.description: The village of Greenhaven is plagued by a pack of ferocious wolves. They have been attacking villagers and livestock, leaving the village on edge.
game.objective: Defeat the leader of the wolf pack and put an end to their terror.

tasks.description: Hunt for the wolf pack's den in the nearby forest.
Gather information about the wolf pack from the villagers.
tasks.objective: Speak to at least three villagers and gather clues.

game.title: Wolves of Greenhaven
